Addepar is Hiring - Engineers - Mountain View, Ca

Who we are: Phenomenal engineers rebuilding the infrastructure that powers global finance. Current technology in the space is super bad, extra broken, and so opaque, scandals like Bernie Madoff can go on for a decade while $64billion vanishes from the economy effecting, endowments, institutions, and notable individuals. We're a close knit team trying to solve this, and having a great time doing it. We play sports, go on trips, and eat our meals together.

What we aren't: A place to share your "current POV," a game to build a virtual farm, or an app to check the ski report or weather.

Join us: Careers.addepar.com
